synopsis.text: The anime follows the story of Nyanta, a young boy who, on his birthday, takes on the responsibility of frying a donut for his mother's special day. However, his well-intentioned plan goes awry when a mischievous prank by some local children leads to an unexpected kitchen fire. Amidst the chaos, Nyanta learns valuable lessons about fire safety that are sure to resonate with young viewers. Join Nyanta on this thrilling and educational adventure as he navigates the challenges of growing up and the importance of fire safety.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
